Title: I Love Her
Writer: Peter Nowalk (created by), Sarah L. Thompson, Morenike Balogun (executive story editor), Abby Ajayi (story editor), Sarah L. Thompson (story editor)
Actors: Viola Davis, Billy Brown, Jack Falahee, Aja Naomi King
Plot: Annalise gathers signatures for her class-action lawsuit with Bonnie is on her trail as their origin story is revealed. Michaela recruits Oliver, while Asher becomes uncomfortable with her work hours and Frank questions Laurel.
